casebody.data:
PHOENIX LIGHTING GROUP, L.L.C.
v.
GENLYTE THOMAS GROUP, L.L.C. 2018-1076 Supreme Court of Ohio. October 10, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and French and DeGenaro, JJ., dissent.

APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Appeal accepted on proposition of law No. III.

O'Donnell, Kennedy, and Fischer, JJ., would accept the appeal on all propositions of law.
